item.title: EMPAC’s First Dance Festival is this week | April 17 - 18
item.description: April 17-18, 2025 — Join us for EMPAC’s inaugural dance festival EPHEMERAL ORGAN, where movement becomes memory. Over two evenings, the artists will transform EMPAC’s spaces into living archives—chambers where dance, installation, and conversation unfold. RPI Community tickets: $5

item.description: Date: Friday, April 18, 2025 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM - Unwind and get creative! Drop by for free coffee and art supplies—no structure, just a chill space to sip, sketch, and relax.

item.title: Volunteer for Commencement 2025
item.description: We’re looking for volunteers who will help make Commencement memorable for our graduates and their families. This year’s Commencement ceremony will be held on Saturday, May 10, at 8:30 a.m. in the East Campus Athletic Village stadium. To volunteer, please fill out the volunteer form no later than Friday, April 18. Thank you for your consideration, and we hope you can join us to celebrate the Class of 2025!

item.title: Dream Furiously: A Talk by Anna Anthropy | April 16
item.description: Generative AI has flooded the internet with art that is technically sound, devoid of nuance, and absent an artist’s hand or sensibilities. In other words, a perfect tool of fascism. How are artists to push back against the tide? By making aggressively bad, horny, unpalatable art. Join this virtual talk on April 16 at 4pm.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere” | April 18
item.description: Date: Friday, April 18, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.

item.description:
